turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to know if this is a bath place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry what was that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. You know what? I want the service.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excuse me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You don't want the order service?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want the service of this sole purpose and the founded assistant.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Google.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can help you order a pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, order me a pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like Want two pieces of pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what size pizzas are they?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just think of it as a set of toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: specially dissolve.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Google.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a standard set of toppings? I can choose from classic pep, garden special, hawaiian, sausage and onion, hurricane.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. So you want a thick crust specialty pizza for all three right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the specialty pizza, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like chicken BBQ on regular hours.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay I'll get you 3 thick crust Bella Luna Specials.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken barbecues, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I'll get you 3 chicken bbq pizzas. Your total will be $66.66.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'll get your reciept via text and they'll be ready in 30 minutes.
